lines.text: Uhoo, don't stop now
Funny, I feel dizzy.
I will work on it, if it's still got some life in it.
The drink! What was in it?
A very strong sedative. Why, you'll probably sleep right through the orgy in the morning.

[as she mounts him even harder]
I must be dreaming.
[about to deflower the group's virgin in a final orgy]
No Bacchanalia is complete without the sacrifice of a Vestal Virgin.
[after Sir Aubrey quotes IN FRANCUM. XXXIII. from The Works of Christopher Marlowe, while whipping off-screen a volunteering woman in a stable]
Bullshit! It's this whole God damn seminar that's bugging me. You're all sick! I'm leaving!
You can't leave!
Why the hell not?
You signed up for the whole weekend. Besides, you'd miss my Bacchanalia tommorow.
Piss on your "Bacchanal".
[the reluctant participant storms out of the stable]

[thinks aloud]
Golden showers. I must make take part of my next seminar.
[when both Sir Aubrey and his topless buxom assistant Lady Amanda herself want the guests to stay after they walked in on him spanking her]
Actually, voyeurism was very popular with the Renaissance painters.
What brings you out here?
Curiosity. I like to learn new things. Besides, I like to fuck.
What? Is that an offer?
There's only one way to find out.
[exposes her left breast for a second, then goes away]
[trying to convince the reluctant participant not to storm out of his room and leave the seminar early]
If you do
[stay]
, you can have me for the night.
No! I've gotta go.
Very well. But at least have a farewell drink with me before you do.
What the hell.
[takes a glass from her and drinks]
Drink it all down. There's a good boy.
[takes and throws the empty glass away]
You do want me, don't you?

[suddenly dizzy]
Hmm, yes. Very much.
Then take me!
[mounts him herself]
